name: Snoot Booper
description:
Fulfill your dreams and boop a dragon's snoot in real-life!*

This is a fan-made tiny interactive booping sim using Catboots' super cute art.

TRAILER

*Not actually in real-life. This is virtual. Pls don't sue.

(Press F for fullscreen/to make it fill the frame. H to hide unimportant things. M to mute.)
